name: MATERIAL SCIENCES 2019| MATERIALS 2019| 20th Edition of International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering
content: Greetings from Materials Conference 2019..!! We take great pleasure in inviting your esteemed self to “EuroSciCon 20th Edition of International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering” schedule on January 28-29, 2019 at Dubai,UAE to join us as a Speaker/Exhibitor/Delegate and share your experiences to enlighten esteemed personalities and researchers by attending the conference. Salient features: People from Industries, research institutes, academic universities, associations and societies will be attending. Your presence will definitely have positive impact on their future ventures and innovations. For more details: -https://materialsconference.euroscicon.com/ With regards James Mathew | Program Manager EuroSciCon Ltd. Email: materials@Materialseuroscicon.com Direct: +44 2033182512
